title: Administrative violation system
context: [ยง6K-8.6] Administrative violation system. With the mutual consent of both the commission and the department, the commission may use the civil natural resource violations system of the department of land and natural resources; provided that the commission shall act whenever the board is authorized to act, to process violations of chapter 6K or any rules adopted thereunder. [L 2004, c 142, ยง3] Cross References Civil natural resource violations act, see chapter 199D.
